TopicTitle: Any news on the new update?

Articles.Content: Just wondering (tried to look but didn't really see anything). When/if the .24 update will be released with contracts, etc. I know it was supposed to be sometime around with the NASA pack which has already been released, soo was wondering if there was word yet on an official date.

Well its going to be another day now that you asked.

Squad are very spiteful like that

So, cheers dude...

They decided to push it back after putting many of the features that were going to be in 0.24 (like improved maneuver nodes, and all the little gameplay tweaks) into the ARM pack. As such, it will come at a later date (SQUAD hasn't announced when).

Everyone's gotta wait for news of updates, that's just the way it is.

2.3 Other forbidden messages

Messages that inquire about release dates for future versions of KSP.
